overview: BBOescape is a platform to help you reduce stress in a subtle effective way. The platform is designed in 9 different verticals to do it most efficiently. At BBOescape, escape = like. BBOescape.com provides a one stop shop for news, games, entertainment, relaxation, travel and question board. BBOescape was conceived from practical, real-world needs we see every day in our life. BBOescape captures your emotions and facilities all you need to re-invent your inner self. Just by engaging with us you also get great rewards.
